mapper.update: update table customer_info set customer_name=#{customer_name},gender=#{gender},birthday=#{birthday}, age=#{age},birth_place=#{birth_place},address=#{address},phone_number=#{phone_number}, education=#{education},#profession=#{profession},salary=#{salary},house_number=#{house_number}, car=#{car},hobby=#{hobby},personality=#{personality},divorce=#{divorce},status=#{status}, company=#{company},child=#{child} where customer_id=#{customer_id};
mapper.select: select * from customer_info, user_requirement where customer_info.customer_name =#{customer_name} and customer_info.customer_id =user_requirement.customer_id;

select * from customer_info join customer_requirement on customer_info.custormer_id = customer_requirement.customer_id where customer_info.customer_name=#{customer_name} and customer_info.phone_number=#{phone_number} and;
